snippet: Super PACs are a dream for the sort of person who likes being a political worker but hates the candidates: it will soon be possible to run a campaign without dealing with an actual contender.
lead_paragraph: Super PACs are a dream for the sort of person who likes being a political worker but hates the candidates: it will soon be possible to run a campaign without dealing with an actual contender.

headline.main: Perry’s Super PAC Keeps Its Distance From Him
headline.seo: Ross Ramsey: Rick Perry and the Power of Super PACs
headline.print_headline: Perry’s Super PAC Keeps Its Distance From Him
